summary: Add explicit memoization support to the patched() API by introducing a `memoized` argument and delegating handling to Core for improved workflow behavior.
userImpact: Users will have explicit memoization control through the patched() API, improving workflow consistency and flexibility.
proposedFix: Add a `memoized` argument to the `patched` and `deprecatePatch` APIs and delegate handling logic to Core.
keyQuote: Add a `memoized` argument to the `patched` and `deprecatePatch` APIs. Delegate handling of the `patched` logic to Core.
